jobListings.title: Clinical Psychologist
jobListings.description:
Who are we?

Hiwell is the largest online therapy platform in Turkey, established to help clients better understand themselves, feel better, and develop a more positive outlook on life. With a pool of 1000 psychologists, it has been preferred by over 350,000 clients. Through our website and mobile application, we aim to establish the healthiest communication between clients and expert psychologists.

How do we work?

Thanks to our mobile application, our clients can receive services from our expert psychologists more quickly and practically. To provide the best service to our clients, we work with psychologists who are experts in their fields. Our priority is to have our expert psychology team consist of psychologists who have completed their master's degree in Clinical Psychology or Family and Couples Therapy, have received/are receiving supervision, and prioritize ethical work.

Hiwell offers a completely online working opportunity. Therefore, you can work from any city you want, at any time you want.

- Graduated from the Psychology undergraduate department,
- Holds a master's degree in Clinical Psychology or Family and Couples Therapy,
- Proficient in therapy practices,
- Experienced in client follow-up,
- Knowledgeable about methods and technologies related to the field,
- Received or is currently receiving supervision,
- Values ethical principles.

If you have the qualifications mentioned above, we are excitedly awaiting your application!

jobListings.title: Clinical Psychologist
jobListings.description:
1001Terapist Platform; is a platform that brings together Mental Health Experts working in the fields of Psychology, Psychiatry, and Psychological Counseling with those who seek psychological support. 1001Terapist Platform lists therapists who have been positively evaluated and have purchased a subscription package service online. Clients can request an online or face-to-face appointment with the most suitable therapist through appropriate filters.

We keep ourselves updated with every kind of digital innovation that will make it easier for clients to receive services from therapists registered on 1001Terapist.com more quickly and practically. We push the limits to maximize your visibility in search engines and ensure that clients have a quality time on the website. Our priority is that therapists registered on our platform are therapists who prioritize ethical principles and are experts in their fields.

Criteria to be considered in 1001Terapist Platform applications:

● Graduated from the Psychology undergraduate department,
● Proficient in therapy practices,
● Experienced in client follow-up,
● Knowledgeable about methods and new developments related to the field,
● Received or is currently receiving supervision,
● Values ethical principles.

jobListings.title: Social Psychologist
jobListings.description: We are looking for a team member who is a native Arabic speaker and knowledgeable about tradition and culture for a short-term project.

jobListings.title: Cognitive Scientist / Cognitive Psychologist
jobListings.description:
We are looking for a Cognitive Scientist/Cognitive Psychologist for our growing technology company. This is a full-time and on-site job.

Responsibilities

Developing valid, reliable, state-of-the-art cognitive measurements via VR-based platforms
Designing VR-based experiences to measure a wide range of cognitive abilities
Conducting in-depth literature reviews and summaries
Collecting, cleaning, and analyzing data
Communicating data analysis results
Participating in all steps of the product development process
Documenting all steps of measurement development, data collection, data analysis, and measurement improvement process

Requirements

At least 5 years of experience in laboratory research
At least a master's degree in Cognitive Science/Cognitive Psychology
A PhD in Psychology, Cognitive Science, or Cognitive Psychology from a reputable university is a plus
Excellent skills in reading and summarizing scientific literature
Excellent knowledge of R, Matlab, or Python
Excellent skills in academic research, statistics, and data analysis
Excellent communication skills, especially in conveying data insights
Passion for technology and cognitive science
Ability to quickly learn assessment techniques
Good understanding of cognitive science literature
Excellent command of the English language
Living in (or willing to relocate to) Istanbul. Ability to access Altunizade.

jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description:
Positive Psychology Clinic is a psychology clinic that adopts the 'Protocol Implementation Approach' as a psychotherapy method. Its client-focused approach aims to understand the unique needs and goals of each individual, providing personalized psychotherapy services to our clients.

What does 'Positive Psychology Clinic' offer for psychologists?

Job Opportunity and Competence
Over 100 hours of specialized training
Supervision and Coaching Program
Psychological Test Training
Protocol Implementation Approach
Participation in International Seminars
The ability for psychologists to determine the work schedule and appointment options
Effortless management of not only appointments but also payments, invoice integrations, and other processes

'Positive Psychology Clinic' offers a completely online working opportunity. Therefore, you can work from any city you want, at any time you want.

Desired Qualifications:

We are looking for psychologists to apply the protocol-based psychotherapy method for our newly established psychology clinic together with international consultants.

Graduated from the Psychology undergraduate department,
Preferably holds a master's degree in 'Clinical Psychology',
Preferably has experience in 'therapy practices' and 'client follow-up',
Closely follows methods and technologies related to the field,
Likes to develop professionally and keep up with innovations,
Has received or is currently receiving supervision,
Values ethical principles.

If you have the qualifications mentioned above, we are excitedly awaiting your application!

jobListings.title: Cognitive-Behavioral Oriented Clinical Psychologist
jobListings.description:
Our client, a high-standard private psychology center with a cognitive-behavioral orientation and a long history of high-volume visits, is looking for autonomous psychologists with a General Master's degree (experience in patient care under the cognitive-behavioral approach) to join their team to remotely care for patients in the Health Psychology and Employee Assistance Program provided to companies in the Spain region.

Education and Experience

Bachelor's degree in Psychology.
General Master's in Health Psychology and/or Health Certificate.
Experience or studies in cognitive-behavioral orientation will be evaluated.
Native English speaker or C2 level.
At least 2 years of experience.
What do we offer?

Flexible schedule and 100% remote work.
Continuous education.
Growth plan.

jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description:
We are looking for psychologists and clinical psychologists who will support our users as experts on our platform, and who want to expand and grow their own client network.

Who are we?

Eczacıbaşı Evital is an online health platform established under the umbrella of Eczacıbaşı Holding, preferred by more than 50,000 clients. On our platform, where users can have online consultations with psychologists, dietitians, and doctors, we aim to establish the healthiest communication between clients and psychologists, dietitians, and doctors through our website and mobile application.

What does evital offer for health professionals and service providers?

The ability for health professionals to determine the work schedule and appointment options
The opportunity to have online consultations with clients from anywhere with internet access
Effortless management of not only appointments but also payments, invoice integrations, and other processes

Desired Qualifications:

We are looking for psychologists/clinical psychologists to join our platform.

Graduated from the Psychology undergraduate department,
Licensed and trained to conduct therapy,
Proficient in therapy practices,
Experienced in client follow-up,
Closely follows methods and technologies related to the field,
Preferably able to issue invoices,
Has received or is currently receiving supervision,
Values ethical principles.

jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description: I have opened one of the rooms in my office, located across from Izmir Alsancak State Hospital, for use by my colleagues who are Psychologists and Psychological Counselors. The room is suitable for individual sessions and is available for hourly and daily use. A fixed fee is charged. There is no assistant service. Tea/coffee is available in the waiting area.

jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description:
Dear friends, hello,

We are looking for a Psychological Counselor or Psychologist who lives close to the Ispartakule (Bahçeşehir) region for the newly opened Eğitimist Children's Academy.

With at least 1 year of experience in kindergarten.

jobListings.title: Expert Clinical Psychologist
jobListings.description: We are looking for experienced, friendly, corporate-oriented colleagues who have their own portfolio, to share expenses or looking for an office in the most lively, high-quality, and beautiful location of Izmir.

jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description:
Full-Time Male/Female Psychologist Wanted!
To work within Antalya Therapy Center in Muratpasa
Who has received a psychology undergraduate education
Follows scientific developments related to their field, knowledgeable about methods, techniques, and technologies,
Strong communication skills, positive, presentable,
Has valid and applicable schools, can adapt to flexible working hours. Applications must be submitted with a CV.
Interview dates will be notified to selected individuals.
Salary+Bonus

jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description:
We are looking for a psychologist with an ALG certificate for our Psychotechnical center in Pendik.

General Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in Psychology
Holds an ALG certificate
Good communication and counseling skills
Empathy ability
Adherence to ethical rules

Job Description

Will perform psychotechnical tests.
Will work full-time.
Interviews will be conducted face-to-face.

jobListings.title: Expert Psychologist
jobListings.description:
· Completed a master's degree after a 4-year undergraduate education in Psychology,
· Capable of conducting sessions with clients over 18 years old,
· Follows scientific developments related to the field; knowledgeable about methods, techniques, and technologies,
· Can adapt to internal dynamics of the institution,

· Adheres to professional ethical principles,

· Proficient in psychotherapy and psychological test applications,
· At least 1 year of experience in client follow-up,
· Can adapt to flexible and intensive working hours,
· Can work part-time,
· Resident in Mersin,

We are looking for an Expert Psychologist to join our team.

jobListings.companyName: Smiling Eyes Special Education and Rehabilitation Center
jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description: We are looking for a psychologist or guidance teacher to work in our rehabilitation center.

jobListings.title: Clinical Psychologist (Shared Office)
jobListings.description:
We are looking for clinical psychologists who have completed a master's degree in clinical psychology and specialized in at least one therapy school, have their own client portfolio, and actively follow up clients, to work in our office on Bağdat Street, either in a shared office or on a percentage basis.

- Tea and coffee are offered for clients.
- We have secretary service.

jobListings.title: Intern Psychologist
jobListings.description:
Subject: Seeking therapist for client referral collaboration

I am looking for a therapist suitable for working face-to-face or online with clients to be referred to my consultancy office in the Bursa-Osmangazi region.

I would like to meet colleagues who are suitable for the following criteria, have a similar working model, or are open to development in this direction and need a space to see their clients.

- Applicants must have a master's degree in clinical psychology,
- Have at least 2 years of active working experience,
- Preferably have their own individual psychotherapy experience,
- Prioritize ethical working values.

jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description: We are looking for team members experienced in social skills and theory of mind training.
